local_intent: Perceive the Coca-Cola bottle, align and set yaw, keep gripper open, execute a 0.15 m lateral push at 90 deg, then retreat, wait, and verify visibility.
assumptions: Target remains within reachable workspace and along a clear push path
Pushing will not topple the bottle or collide with neighbors
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT micro-goal: uses same target and push parameters, includes pre-push visibility check, approach/align, yaw set, open gripper, push, retreat, brief wait, and a post-push visibility verification.
